title: JS & HTML
content:
<html>
  <link rel = "stylesheet"  href ="CSS Name.css">
  <head>
    <title> Insert Title Here </title>
  </head>
  <body> <font color="Color", font_size='14pt'> <--inline CSS
    <h1> Text you want to display </h1>
  </body>
  <a href=?Link here?> Hyperlink text here </a>
  <script type="text/javascript"> 
    var input = window.prompt("Prompt user for something:___");
    document.write(input);
  </script>
</html>
